title: Twelve miners killed by Russian strike in Ukraine, officials say
summary_full: Fifteen others were reported injured in the strike near a bus carrying the workers on Sunday.
summary_public: Fifteen others were reported injured in the strike near a bus carrying the workers on Sunday.
